ch.iserver.ace.collaboration.jupiter.server
Interface Forwarder

All Known Subinterfaces:
CompositeForwarder
public interface Forwarder

A Forwarder is used on the server to forward incoming events to participants. It is responsible to generate requests to be sent to participants.

Method Summary
 void close()
          Closes the forwarder.
 void sendCaretUpdate(int participantId, CaretUpdate update)
          Sends a caret update received from the participant with the given participantId to the forwarder.
 void sendOperation(int participantId, Operation op)
          Sends an Operation received from the participant with the given participantId to the forwarder.
 void sendParticipantJoined(int participantId, RemoteUserProxy user)
          Sends a message to the forwarder that a new user joined the session.
 void sendParticipantLeft(int participantId, int reason)
          Sends a message to the forwarder that the given participant left the session.
 

Method Detail

sendCaretUpdate

void sendCaretUpdate(int participantId,
                     CaretUpdate update)
Sends a caret update received from the participant with the given participantId to the forwarder.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant id of the participant that sent the caret update
update - the caret update

sendOperation

void sendOperation(int participantId,
                   Operation op)
Sends an Operation received from the participant with the given participantId to the forwarder.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant id of the sender
op - the operation

sendParticipantLeft

void sendParticipantLeft(int participantId,
                         int reason)
Sends a message to the forwarder that the given participant left the session.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant that left the session
reason - the reason why the participant left

sendParticipantJoined

void sendParticipantJoined(int participantId,
                           RemoteUserProxy user)
Sends a message to the forwarder that a new user joined the session.

Parameters:
participantId - the participant id of the joined user
user - the proxy of the joined user

close

void close()
Closes the forwarder. No methods should be invoked after this method on the forwarder.
